EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Companies House submission confirmation
Cancel your application to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
Your request to cancel the application to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}({!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}) whose registered office address is {!Transaction__c.CompanyAddress1__c} {!Transaction__c.CompanyPostCode__c} has been successfully submitted. Your reference number for any future enquiries is FE{!Transaction__c.Id}.
The process to cancel the application to close the company has now started. You will receive a further email notifying you if the cancellation has been accepted or rejected.
What happens next
If the cancellation is accepted, the company will not be removed from the register. If the cancellation is rejected, the company will be removed from the register after two months of the closure notice being published in the relevant Gazette.
Click to download a copy of your request
Contact Centre tel +44 (0)303 1234 500 or email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk.
